mapper.insert: insert into intake (code, id, idate, icount) values( #{code}, #{id}, current_date(), 1 )
mapper.update: update intake set icount = icount+1 where code = #{code} and id = #{id} and idate = current_date()
mapper.select: select f.*, i.id, i.idate, i.icount from food as f join intake as i on (f.code = i.code) where i.code = #{code} and i.id = #{id} and i.idate = current_date()
